text:
Unknown even to most members of House [[Tharashk]], the
Valshar’ak Seal is a union of dedicated [[Gatekeepers]] who have vowed to use the resources of the [[dragonmarked house]] to fulfill their ancient duties, and to prevent the [[Dragon Below|Cults of the Dragon Below]] from doing the same. [[Maagrim Torrn|Maagrim Torrn d'Tharashk]] supports the Seal,
but her position as [[triumvir|Tharashk triumvirate]] prevents her from taking
an active role with the group. Currently, the Valshar’ak Seal is led by the venerable [[half-orc]] [[druid]] ''Urlev Torrn''.
title: Valshar'ak Seal
